promising very very very promising application so the way uh The Internet of Things works is so we have a device
Gateway so basically we this is a product AWS iot that that we've develop
to help you know basically anybody who's who's building an Internet of Things application if they're producing things
or applications that interface with those things so device Gateway uh that can communicate with devices um we have
a software development kit that allows people to build interfaces to that Gateway we provide a layer of
authentication because this is a super important thing right um is that you want to make sure that the things are actually connecting to uh other things
that you want them to connect to okay so the authentication layer is extremely important here um a rules engine that
will take messages to and from whether they're going to the device or or or
from the device um and apply rules against them to make sure that they they go to the right place and do what they're expected to do um using various
AWS Services then we also provide Shadow devices so say you have uh a sprinkler
out in a field and uh it's it's connected via wireless connection that for some reason is is uh not stable um
and goes offline your device still exists a shadow of your device exists in the cloud and so that device can receive
information and instructions and store that data and then when the the actual thing is available again um we we can
send those messages along and perform the right tasks based on that and then yeah then your applications can interact
with the shadow device uh there's an API for all of this and then we also have a registry so that
you know as you do have thousands and thousands of of things out there um say if you're you know creating uh Internet
connected sprinklers or whatever for your application you can register them all just like with all of our services
